description: This file defines a Flutter widget called ControlBar that provides undo and restart buttons for a 2048 game. It uses provider for state management to interact with the GameProvider and enables/disables undo based on the game state.

classes.name: ControlBar
classes.description: A stateless widget providing undo and restart controls for the game.

methods.name: build
methods.description: Builds the widget tree for the control bar with undo and restart buttons.

methods.name: _canUndo
methods.description: Determines if undo action should be enabled based on the game state (score > 0).
